com.arcticicestudio.icecore.hashids

Class Hashids.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcticicestudio.icecore.hashids.Hashids.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Hashids

    public static final class Hashids.Builder
extends Object
    An immutable Hashids instance builder with optional features.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Constructs a new instance without a salt, no minimum hash length, the default alphabet and no enabled features.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Hashids.Builder alphabet(String alphabet)
      Sets the alphabet to be used for the hash generation.
      Hashids build()
      Builds a new configured Hashids instance.
      Hashids.Builder features(HashidsFeature... features)
      Enables the given instance features.
      Hashids.Builder minLength(int minLength)
      Sets the minimum hash length.
      Hashids.Builder salt(String salt)
      Sets the salt to be used as entropy.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder()
        Constructs a new instance without a salt, no minimum hash length, the default alphabet and no enabled features.

    • Method Detail

      • salt

        public Hashids.Builder salt(String salt)
        Sets the salt to be used as entropy.

        By default the salt is empty.

        Parameters:
        salt - the salt to be used as entropy
        Returns:
        a new builder instance with the given salt

      • minLength

        public Hashids.Builder minLength(int minLength)
        Sets the minimum hash length.

        The default value is 0.

        Parameters:
        minLength - the minimum hash length
        Returns:
        a new builder instance with the given minimum hash length

      • alphabet

        public Hashids.Builder alphabet(String alphabet)
        Sets the alphabet to be used for the hash generation.

        The default value is the default alphabet.

        Parameters:
        alphabet - the alphabet to be used for the hash generation
        Returns:
        a new builder instance with the given alphabet

      • features

        public Hashids.Builder features(HashidsFeature... features)
        Enables the given instance features.

        By default no features are enabled.

        Parameters:
        features - the features to be enabled for this instance
        Returns:
        a new builder instance with the enabled features
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • build

        public Hashids build()
        Builds a new configured Hashids instance.
        Returns:
        a new configured instance
